login.description: >Login to udemy.com and displays a list of courses to download.

output.name: output
output.description: output directory where the videos will be save, defaults to current directory

export.name: export
export.description: export the course data as json with links

url.name: url
url.description: url of the couse to be downloaded

reset.description: >Erase all login credentials stored and download progress.
